query:
INSERT INTO logic_versions (name, status, createdBy, publishedAt, notes) VALUES ('MIYAR Logic v1.0 — Baseline', 'published', 1, NOW(), 'Initial baseline logic version with default dimension weights and decision thresholds');

SET @lv_id = LAST_INSERT_ID();

INSERT INTO logic_weights (logicVersionId, dimension, weight) VALUES
(@lv_id, 'sa', '0.2500'),
(@lv_id, 'ff', '0.2000'),
(@lv_id, 'mp', '0.2000'),
(@lv_id, 'ds', '0.2000'),
(@lv_id, 'er', '0.1500');

INSERT INTO logic_thresholds (logicVersionId, ruleKey, thresholdValue, comparator, notes) VALUES
(@lv_id, 'validated_min_score', '70.0000', 'gte', 'Minimum composite score for Validated status'),
(@lv_id, 'conditional_min_score', '50.0000', 'gte', 'Minimum composite score for Conditional status'),
(@lv_id, 'high_risk_threshold', '60.0000', 'gte', 'Risk score above this triggers high-risk flag'),
(@lv_id, 'budget_overrun_penalty', '0.1500', 'gt', 'Budget overrun percentage that triggers penalty'),
(@lv_id, 'min_confidence', '40.0000', 'gte', 'Minimum confidence score for reliable evaluation'),
(@lv_id, 'low_differentiation_penalty', '2.0000', 'lte', 'Differentiation score at or below this triggers penalty'),
(@lv_id, 'supply_chain_risk', '2.0000', 'lte', 'Supply chain readiness at or below this triggers risk flag');

INSERT INTO logic_change_log (logicVersionId, actor, changeSummary, rationale) VALUES
(@lv_id, 1, 'Initial logic version created with baseline weights and 7 decision thresholds', 'Establishing baseline calibration for MIYAR scoring engine based on UAE/Dubai market parameters');
